ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ fluid ounces coffee-flavored liqueur (such as Kahlua®)
1 fluid ounce white creme de cacao

cookingTips: Use freshly brewed espresso cooled to room temperature to prevent melting ice too quickly
Shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds to create the signature foam on top
Strain immediately into a chilled glass to maintain temperature and presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What creates that signature silky foam on an Espresso Martini?
